name: Config Europe – Communicating design systems
description:
Link to the talk here.


I had an honour of speaking at Config Europe 2020 about design systems in the context of working together. I'm sharing my slides here ✨


Communicating design systems

On the surface, a design system is a collection of design elements: color, layout, typography, iconography, etc., but behind each is a series of decisions that shaped its current form. The result is a reflection of your team’s ability to arrive at a simple, single answer in conversations with the system’s creators and users. This talk was informed by a series of interviews with systems designers, and explores why, and how, communicating your design system is the key to its success.


Viktoriia Nikitina, Product designer at GitHub

Originally from Ukraine, I now live in Berlin, and design things at GitHub. My areas of focus are design systems, design infrastructure, mobile, and dual-screen devices. As an immigrant and a self-taught designer, I share my experiences as a way to give back to the design community.
